articles.title: DPRK's Test-fire of SLBM Is Just: Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
DPRK's Test-fire of SLBM Is Just: Foreign Ministry
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Tuesday in connection with the fact that the U.S. is ratcheting up the pressure on the DPRK while citing the DPRK's test-fire of submarine-launched ballistic missile:
					 The big success in test-fire of the SLBM brought about by the DPRK's scientists and technicians in the field of national defence marked a historical event as it provided another means of powerful nuclear attack of Juche Korea. It was the exercise of the just right to self-defence to safeguard the sovereignty and right to existence of the country and the nation from the U.S. escalating threat of nuclear war.
					
					 But the U.S. and its followers spew out sophism that the test-fire is a violation of "resolutions" of the UN Security Council and renders the situation in the region and the world unstable.
					
					 The U.S. even set in motion the UN Security Council to work out a statement which "denounced" the DPRK's ballistic missile activities, while terming them "an act of escalating regional and world tensions".
					
					 We have flatly denied all the "resolutions" of the UN Security Council that sided with the U.S. vicious moves against the DPRK and have firmly safeguarded the peace on the Korean peninsula and the region by dint of the military capabilities for self-defence with the nuclear force as a pivot.
					
					 The peace and security on the Korean peninsula are being wrecked by the U.S. which is keen on nuclear war moves targeting the DPRK with the mobilization of all nuclear strike means including strategic nuclear submarine.
					
					 Now that the U.S. is rendering the situation extremely tense while persisting in hostile policy and nuclear threats to the DPRK, the only way for the DPRK to avert thermo-nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and the region is to ensure balance of force by dint of powerful nuclear deterrence.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the U.S. is branding the measures taken by the DPRK to bolster nuclear force including the test-fire of SLBM as a threat to the peace and security in the region and the world. This is illogical and will only increase the danger of armed conflict and war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. continued pursuance of extreme hostile policy and nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK will only make the latter make drastic progress in bolstering nuclear attack capabilities.
					
					 We will bolster the nuclear force pursuant to the Workers' Party of Korea's strategic plan to counter the nuclear weapons in kind no matter what others may say.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Tanzania
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Tanzania
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to President of Tanzania Johon Magufuli on the occasion of the 52nd founding anniversary of the United Republic of Tanzania.
					 Expressing belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message sincerely wished the government and people of Tanzania greater success in their work for the development and prosperity of the country under the leadership of the president.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Sierra Leone
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Sierra Leone
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Ernest Bai Koroma, president of the Republic of Sierra Leone, on April 22 on the occasion of its 55th independence day.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative ties between the DPRK and Sierra Leone would grow stronger in various fields, the message wished the president of Sierra Leone big successes in his work for national unity, socio-economic development and people's wellbeing.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation led by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong came back home Tuesday after taking part in the High-level Thematic Debate on Achieving the Sustainable Development Goals and the Signature Ceremony for the Paris Agreement on the Issue of Climate Change held at the UN headquarters.

articles.title: DPRK Skaters Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Skaters Back Home
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK skaters came back home Tuesday after participating in the 2016 ISU World Development Trophy Short-track Speed Skating Tournament.
					 They won two trophies, four gold medals and two silver medals at the tournament.
					
					 They were greeted by officials concerned at Pyongyang Railway Station.
					
					 Sportspersons congratulated them on their success, putting garlands around their necks and presenting bouquets to them.

articles.title: DPRK Players Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Players Back Home
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK players came back home Tuesday after taking part in the 4th China Open Athletics Championships-2016 IPC Athletics Grand Prix held in Beijing, China from April 22 to 24.
					 It brought together more than 200 players from over 20 countries including the DPRK.
					
					 DPRK player Kim Chol Ung won the first place in the T11-12 category 5 000 meter race and acquired the qualification for the 15th International Paralympic Games to be held in Brazil in September, 2016.

articles.title: Delegation of Federation of Koreans in U.S. Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Federation of Koreans in U.S. Leaves
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. headed by Chairman Yun Kil Sang left here on Tuesday.

articles.title: Women in DPRK Indignant over Group Abduction
articles.content:
Women in DPRK Indignant over Group Abduction
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of traitors in south Korea recently abducted in broad daylight the women employees of the DPRK who were working at a restaurant overseas.
					 It is an unethical crime, an outcome of the anti-DPRK confrontation policy pursued by the Park Geun Hye group keen to realize its ambition for "unification of social systems".
					
					 In this regard, DPRK Labor Hero Mun Kang Sun, a weaver of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, told KCNA:
					
					 I can hardly repress my surging resentment against the Park Geun Hye group of traitors who committed unethical crime. It is extremely harrowing that they were separated from their families by force due to Crueler Devil of Chongwadae. Those traitors are nothing but villains and confrontational maniacs who are desperately working hard to reduce even women into hostages for the anti-DPRK smear campaign by forcing "defection" upon the abducted women.
					
					 Severe punishment should be meted out to the group of traitors who runs amuck without elementary ethics to do harm to fellow countrymen.
					
					 Pak Tong Sun, a staff of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry, said:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group of traitors abetted agents of "National Intelligence Service" abducting the DPRK citizens. And they refuse to accept the DPRK's demand for repatriating the abductees.
					
					 Park Geun Hye should apologize to the whole Korean nation for her hideous crime and send them back home as early as possible.
					
					 Jong Un Gyong, an artist of the Mansudae Art Studio, said.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group of traitors should return home the abducted women workers without delay and should punish kidnappers and wire-pullers involved in the abduction case.

articles.title: Abduction of Women Workers Kindles Indignation
articles.content:
Abduction of Women Workers Kindles Indignation
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK people are letting loose their anger at gangster-like agents of the National Intelligence Service of south Korea, who committed thrice-cursed crime of abducting DPRK women employees working at a restaurant overseas.
					 Han Song Gyu, a student of Kim Chaek University of Technology, told KCNA:
					
					 The recent abduction is a product of flagrant confrontational moves of the south Korean group of traitors and a politically-motivated provocation against the fellow countrymen in the DPRK.
					
					 The confrontational hysteria against the DPRK kicked up by Park Geun Hye and her gangsters reaches its height. Such brutal and unethical abduction can never be tolerated.
					
					 Park should be mindful of the surging wrath and hatred of the DPRK students and stop anti-DPRK hostile acts at once.
					
					 Yu Son Suk, a member of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at the Pyongyang Trolley Bus Factory, said:
					
					 Kidnappers and wire-pullers involved in the abduction should be heavily punished. The victims are daughters of the DPRK who grew up with nothing to envy in the world under the loving care of the socialist homeland.
					
					 The south Korean group of gangsters is trying to cover up their unethical crime, talking about "free willingness" and "international practices".
					
					 It would be good for them to immediately stop appeasing and deceiving the abductees and send them back to their beloved families.

articles.title: Korean Association for Supporting Children
articles.content:
Korean Association for Supporting Children
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Korean Association for Supporting the Children has made contributions to improving health and living conditions of children.
					 According to Kim Myong Chol, section chief of the association, some areas in Pyongyang City and South Hamgyong, North and South Phyongan and Kangwon provinces were selected as its targets. 
					
					 Its offices opened in those areas and mobile clinics equipped with pediatric appliances are run in remote areas.
					
					 The Songyo Children's Clinic was built in the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill in April last year, which is followed by other children's clinics now under construction in target areas. Meanwhile, a process of producing nutrients for children was set up at the foodstuff factory in Riwon County, South Hamgyong Province under the assistance program of the association.
					
					 The association, founded on November 21, Juche 102 (2013), is planning to expand the sphere of its activities, create the social atmosphere for assisting children and help children and pregnant and nursing women in case of emergency by keeping close contact with medical volunteers.
					
					 In the DPRK, May 20 and November 20 are the Child Health Day.

articles.title: Sturgeon Dishes Popular in DPRK
articles.content:
Sturgeon Dishes Popular in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Sturgeon dishes served at the Delicacy House under Okryu Restaurant in the DPRK are enjoying great popularity.
					 According to Ra Suk Gyong, chief engineer of the restaurant, the house set on tables tens of varieties of sturgeon dishes, including steamed, boiled and roasted sturgeons.
					
					 Sturgeon, rich in gelatin and other nutrition, is known efficacious for liver diseases, diabetes and other diseases and helps prevent aging. 
					
					 Overseas Koreans and even foreigners highly praise the sturgeon cuisines.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il in his lifetime personally took detailed measures to serve sturgeon dishes to people.

articles.title: Japanese Regime Accused of Inciting Hostility toward Koreans
articles.content:
Japanese Regime Accused of Inciting Hostility toward Koreans
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- With a recent great quake that jolted Kyushu area of Japan as a momentum, false rumors that "Koreans poisoned wells" and "everyone should beware of Koreans' riots" are being openly spread through the internet to incite extreme hostility and repugnancy toward Koreans.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says:
					
					 This is an intolerable insult and provocation to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan and an unpardonable hostile act against the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are running wild to repeat their past crimes, far from making an apology and reparation to the Koreans in Japan and other Koreans for their brutal massacre of Koreans in the wake of the great Kanto quake in the past. This dangerous act should never be pardoned.
					
					 Lurking behind the base red herrings being spread by the Japanese reactionaries against Koreans in the wake of the Kyushu quake is a sinister design to create a terror-ridden atmosphere throughout the Korean community, instill anti-DPRK, anti-Chongryon sentiments into the Japanese people and suppress and stamp out Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are now expressing towering anger at the hideous red herring operation and conspiratorial racket against the DPRK and Chongryon. They are firmly determined to surely force the Japanese reactionaries to pay dearly for their campaign against Koreans. 
					
					 The Japanese regime should discreetly behave, well aware that its suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan is an unpardonable provocation to the DPRK and a suicidal act of pushing the DPRK-Japan relations to an irretrievable phase.

articles.title: Nuclear Arms Race Hot among Big Powers: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Nuclear Arms Race Hot among Big Powers: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A nuclear arms race is getting hot among big powers to gain a strategic edge worldwide. 
					 Recently U.S. media and military experts claimed that a new Cold War era is in the offing due to the imbalance of nuclear force among big powers including Russia and China as the Obama administration is putting increased spurs to the development of ultra-modern supersonic delivery means, while miniaturizing nuclear warheads. 
					
					 According to the New York Times on April 17, the U.S. scenario to bolster up the nuclear force is to produce smaller nuclear warheads and improve the stealth capacity of delivery means and strike accuracy. Pursuant to this scenario, the U.S. is pressing forward the plan to develop five types of new nuclear warheads including the development of supersonic warheads and their delivery means.
					
					 The U.S. Center for Strategic and International Studies said in a report released last year that the U.S. should have in place nuclear warheads of diverse power fit for use at every phase of increasing nuclear threat.
					
					 The U.S. publicly declared  that it would put greater spurs to the modernization of nuclear weapons including nuclear warheads-tipped  missiles, nuclear strategic bombers and  nuclear-powered  submarines by investing 1 trillion dollars in 30 years to come, sparking off a new nuclear arms race. 
					
					 The U.S. has been loudmouthed about the "nuclear disarmament" so far. This was nothing but a hypocritical slogan to weaken its strategic rivals, while covering up its moves to modernize nuclear weapons.
					
					 Russia is not hiding the fact that it is not interested in the unilateral nuclear disarmament any longer and goes its own way, now that it has become clear the U.S. has an axe to grind while playing a trick as regards the issue of nuclear disarmament.
					
					 Russia has begun to deploy long-range ballistic missiles of the new generation tipped with four smaller nuclear warheads and the Russian Navy is going ahead with the development of submarine nuclear strike means capable of reducing coastal cities to debris through radioactive contamination by exploding smaller nuclear weapons in coastal waters of the rival forces.
					
					 China has also mounted several smaller nuclear warheads on many long-range ballistic missiles and is stepping up the development of "ultra supersonic glider" capable of mounting a nuclear attack on any target in any place on the earth within one hour.
					
					 This means the start of a hot nuclear arms race in the 21st century among the U.S., Russia and China.
					
					 Recently the director of the CIA testified at the Senate Armed Services Committee it is highly likely that the nuclear arms race will be under way among the above-said countries in a manner similar to that in the Cold War era.
					
					 The prospect of the denuclearization of the world is becoming dimmer because the U.S. trumpeting about "nuclear disarmament" turned out to be hypocritical and a new nuclear arms race has become hot among big powers.

articles.title: Minju Joson on Final Doom of U.S.
articles.content:
Minju Joson on Final Doom of U.S.
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, an American weekly newspaper of Fairfield City, California State posted an article titled "Naked fascist" on its website.
					 The article says that the U.S. is reviving fascism at present, adding that political opposition is suppressed by gangsters, human rights are abused and freedom is violated by the fascist dictatorship in the U.S. and ultra-right forces and militarist police forces have already emerged there.
					
					 An expert on American affairs of the German Association for Foreign Policy Studies in a press interview also referred to the corrupt U.S. political landscape in which a tiny handful of big monopoly capitalists are lording it not only over broad toiling popular masses but also over the state.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says:
					
					 This tells that the true colors of the U.S., the empire of evils in the 21st century, are brought to light under the eyes of the world.
					
					 It is the reality of the American society where justice is trampled down by injustice and the weak insulted by the strong can hardly find anyone to whom they can complain of it.
					
					 The U.S. is openly applying the jungle law in the world arena at present, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. gangsterism of driving the world into a labyrinth of confusion, flexing its muscle, is putting the Hitler fascists into the shade.
					
					 The fascists met their final doom for committing monstrous genocide, blatantly challenging the desire of humankind for independence and justice in the last century.
					
					 The world will see before long the final ruin of the most heinous fascist dictatorial state in the world, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Criminal Nature of U.S. "Sanctions" against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Criminal Nature of U.S. "Sanctions" against DPRK
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Obama's gentries are staging a farce for "independent sanctions" against the DPRK with Japan and south Korean puppet forces in the wake of fabricating the UN "resolution on sanctions" No. 2270 against the DPRK. Not content with this, they added the "list of contraband goods" to the "items under sanctions" at the UN Security Council, describing it as a "shocking" and "fatal" measure.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentator's article says that such action is the crudest violation of the DPRK's sovereignty, a product of the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices and a hideous criminal move to "bring down" the former's "social system".
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is slapping such "sanctions" against the DPRK not because of its nukes and satellites but because it emerged a fortress of socialism in the east, convincing the world people of the inevitable doom of capitalism in practice, it is advancing proudly its own way, not bound to the international order set by the U.S. and its dollar domination and the DPRK is putting brake on the U.S. scenario to carry out the strategy to dominate the world from the steadfast independent stand of opposing the U.S.
					
					 All the "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK adopted at the UN are by no means an expression of the "general will" of its member states as they were invented by the U.S. and adopted by the world body through  coercion of other countries.
					
					 It was quite natural that the DPRK branded such illegal "resolutions on sanctions" as crimes and categorically rejected them.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers' "sanctions" against the DPRK are only further hardening its army and people's revolutionary faith and capability for self-development and their iron will to counter the enemies' reactionary offensive with the revolutionary one.
					
					 The U.S. had better behave itself, properly understanding who its rival is.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Their Intention to Set Fire to Forests
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Their Intention to Set Fire to Forests
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Balloons containing inflammable materials, timers and electric detonating devices were recently discovered in forests of Mt. Kumgang area including Namae-ri and Onjong-ri of Kosong County, Kangwon Province and Hanwol-ri of Anak County, South Hwanghae Province. 
					 According to the investigation made by an institution of the DPRK, it has been confirmed that these balloons were sent by the south Korean puppet group into areas of the north to set fire to its forests.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes:
					
					 This is the evil deed which could be perpetrated only by the confrontation maniacs utterly disregarding ethics and the nation.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group of traitors is resorting to despicable subversive activities and sabotage against the DPRK, but it is nothing but the last-ditch efforts of those frightened by the might of the DPRK dashing forward like the wind to achieve the final victory, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The Park group's above-said action reflects the abnormal psychology of the old witch of Chongwadae finding herself in the most serious ruling crisis owing to its worst traitorous policy and reveals her inveterate hostility toward the DPRK.
					
					 Lurking behind this criminal action is a sinister and crafty intention to kick off a noisy anti-DPRK propaganda after setting fire to forests. However, it is a daydream.
					
					 No matter how desperately they may resort to sinister plots and subversive activities and sabotage, they can never hold in check the dynamic advance of the DPRK towards a rosy future of a thriving nation.
					
					 The persistent anti-DPRK provocations of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors on the deathbed would only precipitate its doomsday.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Kicks off Dangerous Arms Buildup
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Kicks off Dangerous Arms Buildup
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Defense Ministry recently made public "2017-2021 mid-term defense plan", dangerous scenario for arms beef-up for mounting a preemptive attack on the north, according to the south Korean newspaper Herald Economy on April 20.
					 According to it, the puppet warmongers are mulling investing huge amount of budget in top-priority establishment of Kill Chain, weapons system for mounting a preemptive attack on the north, and MD system.
					
					 To this end the puppet forces involved in it the development of carbon fiber bomb and introduction of ballistic missile early-warning radar.
					
					 They are working hard to introduce spy drones into all units, double the sphere of reconnaissance and purchase latest tanks, mortars and U.S. F-35 fighters.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Demands Lift of "Sanctions" against North
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Demands Lift of "Sanctions" against North
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea staged a demonstration near the Chongwadae in Seoul on April 20 in protest against the U.S. and south Korean regime's moves to stifle the DPRK.
					 The organization censured the U.S. and the south Korean regime for holding in Seoul that day a high-level strategic consultation to consistently preserve and ratchet up "sanctions" and "pressure" upon the DPRK.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. and the south Korean regime lift their anachronistic "sanctions" against the DPRK and halt their moves to stifle it.

articles.title: S. Korean Prosecution's Investigation into Independent Lawmaker Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Prosecution's Investigation into Independent Lawmaker Slammed
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet prosecution is busy investigating Yun Jong O, independent lawmaker from the former Unified Progressive Party who defeated Yun Tu Hwan, candidate from the "Saenuri Party" by a wide margin of votes in the recent "National Assembly" election.
					 On April 20, the Ulsan District Prosecutor's Office let a prosecutor and investigator search his house and office in Northern District of Ulsan and the house of the secretary general of the election office on charge of violating the "law on election" and seize their cell phones.
					
					 On April 14, the prosecution confiscated major materials including computer and documents in his office and on April 7 searched the office of the organizations represented by Yun Jong O after labeling it an illegal election office.
					
					 The puppet group's foolish repressive racket to bridge over the crisis caused by its election defeat would not help escape a miserable fate.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for Congratulating 7th Congress of WPK Formed in Nigeria
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for Congratulating 7th Congress of WPK Formed in Nigeria
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria for congratulating the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on holding its 7th Congress was formed in Abuja on April 21.
					 Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to present a message of greeting and floral basket to supreme leader Kim Jong Un and visit the DPRK embassy in Abuja on the occasion of the 7th Congress of the WPK.
					
					 It decided to hold a seminar, film show and other colorful events to praise the party-building and leading exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and wise leadership of Kim Jong Un and introduce the history of victory and glory of the WPK and the Korean people in their struggle for defending the country's sovereignty and building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Library Opens in Spain
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Library Opens in Spain
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Library opened in Tarragona City, Spain on April 9 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 Present at an opening ceremony of the library were members of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain and masses of all strata.
					
					 The reporter and speakers including Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the association, said that Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea, built a power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence and leader Kim Jong Il firmly defended the country's sovereignty and socialist cause with his original Songun politics and provided the eternal foundation for building a thriving nation.
					
					 They stressed that the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is being successfully carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They called for sprucing up the library and giving wide publicity to the undying feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The participants watched the Korean film "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un" after looking around the library.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Figures
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Meetings, photo, book and handicraft exhibitions and film shows took place in Mexico City and Queretaro State of Mexico, Cotonou of Benin and Helsinki of Finland from April 13 to 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the immortal exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, books and photos introducing Juche Korea dashing forward to the final victory and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched the Korean film "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un".
					
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, said that Kim Il Sung saved the Korean people from the colonial slavery of the Japanese imperialists and built a socialist state centered on the popular masses.
					
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said that Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea and Songun idea, led the Korean revolution to victory and dynamically propelled the cause of human independence.
					
					 Pekka Kotkasaari, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and other personages lauded Kim Il Sung for dedicating his whole life to the country's prosperity, people's happiness and national reunification.
					
					 Messages of greeting to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Finland.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 They included round-table talks in Syria, a lecture, photo exhibition and film show in India, round-table talks, book exhibition and film show in Iran on April 11 and 12.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the immortal exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and books and photos introducing Juche Korea.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched the Korean films "Kimilsungia, Flower of the Sun" and "The Arch of Triumph".
					
					 The general secretary of the Syrian Communist Party (Unified) lauded Kim Il Sung as the great leader who achieved the undying feats in performing the Korean revolution and accomplishing the cause of human independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi said that Kim Il Sung explored the cause of independence with his Songun revolutionary leadership and led it to victory, adding that his Songun leadership is being successfully carried forward by H.E. Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Foreign Newspapers Praise Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Foreign Newspapers Praise Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried write-ups illustrated with the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of his birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun).
					 The Lao newspaper Vientiane Mai on April 7 in an article titled "Eternal sun of Juche" said Comrade Kim Il Sung is held in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK and eternal leader of the party and people.
					
					 The Venezuelan newspaper Vea on April 13 in an article titled "DPRK celebrates 104th birth anniversary of HE Kim Il Sung" said the Korean revolution could emerge ever-victorious under the unprecedentedly complicated situation thanks to the Juche idea and Songun idea founded by him.
					
					 The Congolese newspaper Le Patriot on April 11 in an article titled "Sunny smile" introduced the sacred revolutionary career and undying exploits of Kim Il Sung who devoted his whole life to the people, regarding it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 The Mozambican newspaper Noticias on April 12 carried an article titled "104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung celebrated in DPRK", which said the Korean people mark with splendor the Day of the Sun as the greatest national holiday and great auspicious day of mankind.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Zambia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Zambia
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in pamphlet by the Zambian Associated Publishing House on April 21 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.)
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the Workers' Party of Korea is a proud course in which it has taken responsible care of the people and led the Korean revolution to victory under the guidance of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Japanese Public Condemns Authorities' Independent Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
Japanese Public Condemns Authorities' Independent Sanctions against DPRK
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Japanese public voiced criticism of the authorities' criminal independent sanctions against the DPRK.
					 A resolution adopted at a meeting held in Kobe condemned the authorities for independently slapping cruel sanctions on the DPRK in breach of the May, 2014 DPRK-Japan inter-governmental Stockholm agreement.
					
					 The resolution demanded the immediate lift of the sanctions as they escalate the tension in Northeast Asia and infringe upon the rights of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 It is advisable for the government to make an apology for its past colonial rule and promote the exchange with the DPRK but not to opt for banning it, the resolution said.
					
					 The government's exclusion of the Koreans schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools is a criminal act against international law, it charged.
					
					 The chairman of the Saitama Prefectural People's Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity said the DPRK's satellite launch is an exercise of an independent right of a sovereign state and urged the government to work for normalization of diplomatic relations in accordance with the Japan-DPRK Pyongyang Declaration.
					
					 The Japanese Women's Society for Solidarity with the Korean Women denounced the government for worsening the bilateral relations by applying unreasonable independent sanctions.

articles.title: Guinean Organization Denounces Japanese Reactionaries for Their Moves against DPRK and Chongryon
articles.content:
Guinean Organization Denounces Japanese Reactionaries for Their Moves against DPRK and Chongryon
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea issued a statement on April 19 in denunciation of the Japanese reactionaries' moves against the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries following the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is working hard to crack down on Chongryon as their all moves against the DPRK proved futile.
					
					 They are leaving no means untried to tarnish the image of Chongryon by letting police search the Korean primary, middle and high schools and offices of the economic body under Chongryon under unreasonable pretext.
					
					 They are also mulling suspending the payment of subsidies for the Korean schools.
					
					 We strongly denounce the Japanese reactionaries' moves as the blatant violation of the sovereignty of an independent state and unethical crimes.
					
					 We strongly urge the Japanese reactionaries to immediately stop their politically-motivated suppression and persecution of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 We call on the governments and organizations of all countries of the world to denounce Japan's unethical acts and send firm solidarity to Chongryon's just struggle for national right.

articles.title: MINREX insiste en justedad de ensayo de lanzamiento de misil balistico por submarino estrategico
articles.content:
MINREX insiste en justedad de ensayo de lanzamiento de misil balistico por submarino estrategico
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de la ACNC formulada en relacion con una campana de presion anti- Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de Estados Unidos que se perpetra cuestionando el ensayo de lanzamiento del misil balistico del submarino estrategico, realizado por la RPDC, el portavoz de MINREX dio siguiente respuesta:
					El gran exito logrado por nuestros tecnicos de ciencia de defensa nacional en el lanzamiento de misil balistico del submarino estrategico constituye un evento historico que preparo otro remedio poderoso de ataque nuclear de la Corea del Juche y el ejercicio del justo derecho a defender la soberania y el derecho a la existencia del pais y la nacion desde la cada dia mas recrudescente amenaza de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Pero, este pais americano y sus fuerzas seguidoras sueltan las sofisterias de que este lanzamiento deviene una violacion de las "resoluciones" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y crea la inestabilidad en la situacion regional e internacional.
					
					Para colmo, el pais norteamericano hizo que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU publicara una comunicacion que "condena" nuestras actividades de misil balistico calificandolas de "actos destinados a exacerbar la tension de la region y el resto del mundo".
					
					Hemos rechazado tajantemente todas las "resoluciones" del CS de la ONU alistado a las perversas maniobras de EE.UU. contra la RPDC y estamos defendiendo con firmeza la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la region apoyandose en las fuerzas militares autodefensivas, cuyo eje es las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					La paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana estan destruyendose debido a EE.UU. que actua freneticamente para las maniobras de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC movilizando todos los medios de ataque nuclear inclusive submarino estrategico nuclear.
					
					Hoy en dia, en que EE.UU. agrava al extremo la tension a traves de la politica hostil y la amenaza nuclear contra la RPDC, el unico remedio para prevenir el estallido de la guerra termonuclear en la Peninsula Coreana y la region deviene solo el aseguramiento del equilibrio de las fuerzas basado en el poderoso disuasivo nuclear. 
					
					A pesar de esto, EE.UU. cuestiona el reciente lanzamiento y otras actividades de la RPDC por fortalecer las fuerzas armadas nucleares como amenaza a la paz y la seguridad regional e internacional, lo cual deviene una teoria tan bandidesca que agranda el peligro del conflicto militar y de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Cuanto mas recurre EE.UU. a la extrema politica hostil y las maniobras de amenaza y chantaje nucleares contra la RPDC, tanto mas se desarrollara de manera incesante y vertiginosa la capacidad de ataque nuclear de la RPDC.
					
					Sin hacer caso de las opiniones de otros paises, aceleraremos mas el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares segun la intencion estrategica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de hacer frente con las armas nucleares a las armas nucleares.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente tanzanio
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente tanzanio
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 26 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente tanzanio en ocasion del aniversario 52 de la fundacion de la Republica Unida de Tanzania.
					El remitente expresa la conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion de larga tradicion entre la RPDC y Tanzania, y desea que bajo la direccion del mandatario, el gobierno y pueblo tanzanios logren mayores exitos en las labores para el desarrollo y prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente de Sierra Leona
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente de Sierra Leona
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 22 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Sierra Leona, Ernest Bai Koroma, con motivo del 55o aniversario de la independencia de este pais africano.
					Convencido de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas en el futuro en varios dominios, el remitente desea de todo corazon al destinatario grandes exitos en su trabajo para la unidad nacional, el desarrollo socio-economico y el bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: Potencias mundiales acarrean carrera armamentista nuclear, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Potencias mundiales acarrean carrera armamentista nuclear, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- En ambito mundial se torna cada dia mas furiosa la carrera armamentista nuclear de las potencias para tomar la supremacia estrategica. 
					Los medios de prensa norteamericanos y los especialistas en los asuntos militares estiman que llega la era de nueva guerra fria por el desequilibrio de las fuerzas armadas nucleares entre las potencias incluso Rusia y China creado por la administracion Obama que da mas acicate al desarrollo de los medios de transporte supersonicos sofisticados minimizando mas las ojivas nucleares.
					
					El periodico estadounidense The New York Times reporto el 17 de abril que EE.UU. consolida sus fuerzas armadas nucleares con rumbo a minimizar mas las ojivas nucleares y mejorar la funcion Stealth y la exactitud de ataque de los medios de transporte, y agrego que para ese fin, el imperio americano promueve el plan de desarrollo de las nuevas ojivas nucleares de 5 tipos incluso las ojivas supersonicas y los medios de su transporte. 
					
					En su informe publicado el ano pasado el Centro de Estudio de Asuntos Estrategicos e Internacionales de EE.UU. insistio en que su pais debe poseer las ojivas nucleares de diferentes poderios capaces de utilizar en cada etapa en que se multiplica la amenaza nuclear. 
					
					Ya EE.UU. anuncio oficialmente que durante 30 anos proximos desembolsara un billon de dolares a la modernizacion de armas nucleares como misiles de ojivas nucleares, cazabombarderos estrategicos nucleares y submarinos nucleares, de modo que dio inicio a la nueva carrera armamentista nuclear. 
					
					Hasta la fecha, el imperio americano solia hablar de la "reduccion de armas nucleares" a fin de encubrir la modernizacion de sus armas nucleares y debilitar a sus rivales estrategicos. 
					
					Dado que se ha evidenciado la intencion de EE.UU., Rusia no oculta mas su posicion de actuar segun su propia opcion sin tener interes en la reduccion unilateral de las armas nucleares.
					
					Y comenzo a emplazar los misiles balisticos de largo alcance de nueva generacion cargados con las 4 ojivas nucleares minimizadas. Ahora, las fuerzas navales de Rusia estan desarrollando los medios de ataque nuclear submarinos capaces de convertir en zonas muertas las ciudades litorales mediante la contaminacion radiactiva causada por la explosion de armas nucleares minimizadas en la profundidad litoral del pais rival.
					
					Tambien, China carga las ojivas nucleares minimizadas en los misiles balisticos de largo alcance y acelera el desarrollo de "aeroplano supersonico" capaz de dar dentro de una hora el ataque nuclear contra el cualquier blanco en el globo terraqueo. 
					
					De esta manera, se empezo la enconada carrera armamentista nuclear del siglo XXI entre EE.UU., Rusia y China, potencias nucleares mundiales. 
					
					El director de la Agencia Estatal de Inteligencia de EE.UU. dijo en la Comision Senatorial de Servicios Armados que es muy posible que la carrera armamentista nuclear entre las potencias nucleares se desarrolle con el modo semejante de la guerra fria. 
					
					Puesto que se ha revelado completamente que la insistencia de EE.UU. en la "reduccion de armas nucleares" es un engano para tomar la supremacia estrategica y que se acelera la nueva carrera armamentista nuclear entre las potencias, se hace mas tenebrosa la desnuclearizacion del mundo entero.

articles.title: Minju Joson rechaza rumores ridiculos anticoreanos en Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson rechaza rumores ridiculos anticoreanos en Japon
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- En los ultimos dias los reaccionarios japoneses divulgan abiertamente en Internet las mentiras de que "los coreanos echaron el veneno en el pozo" y "vigilen la posible sublevacion de los coreanos" para inculcar la enemistad y repugnancia nacionales utilizando el reciente gran sismo en Kyushu, Japon.
					Tales rumores absurdos constituyen el intolerable insulto y provocacion contra la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) y los coreanos residentes en Japon y un imperdonable acto hostil a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 26, y continua:
					
					El pueblo coreano no puede tolerar jamas a los peligrosos actos de los reaccionarios japoneses que tratan de repetir sus crimenes del pasado en que asesinaron sin ton ni son a los coreanos con motivo del gran terremoto de Kanto en vez de pedir disculpas e indemnizar a los coreanos residentes en Japon y a todo el pueblo coreano.
					
					Tales maniobras de divulgar los rumores falsos persiguen el objetivo negro de crear la inquietud y panico en la sociedad de los coreanos en Japon, infundir en la poblacion japonesa el sentimiento enemigo anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon y aplastar y exterminar a esta organizacion y a los coreanos residentes en Japon.
					
					Ahora, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos no ocultan la gran indignacion contra los reaccionarios japoneses que se enfrascan en la campana de aplastamiento anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon y redoblan la voluntad de hacerles pagar el precio caro. 
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben actuar con prudencia teniendo clara cuenta de que el maltrato y represion contra la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en Japon devienen la provocacion intolerable contra la RPDC y el acto de autodestruccion que lleva las relaciones bilaterales a la peor situacion irrecuperable.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun anatomiza esencia criminal de "sancion" anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun anatomiza esencia criminal de "sancion" anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- Los compinches de Obama inventaron la "resolucion de sancion" no. 2270 de la ONU contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y tomaron sucesivamente las medidas de "sancion independiente" junto con Japon y los titeres surcoreanos. Insatisfechos con esto, adicionaron en los "rubros de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU la "lista de mercancias prohibidas de exportacion e importacion" hablando de "impacto" y "acabo".
					En un articulo publicado este martes, el comentarista del diario Rodong Sinmun lo califica de mas brutal violacion de la soberania de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, producto del despotismo y arbitrariedades de EE.UU. y crimen para "derrocar el regimen" de la RPDC, y continua:
					
					Entonces, ?por que EE.UU. ejerce la "sancion" sobre la RPDC? No es porque la RPDC cuenta con armas nucleares y satelites. El verdadero motivo reside en que el baluarte socialista levantado en el Oriente ensena a la humanidad la inevitabilidad del arruinamiento del capitalismo, el pueblo coreano vive dignamente a su propia manera sin atarse al orden internacional establecido por EE.UU. y la dominacion de dolar, y frena la realizacion de la estrategia de hegemonia mundial de EE.UU. manteniendo la posicion antiyanqui e independiente. 
					
					Todas las "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC, aprobadas hasta la fecha en la ONU, fueron inventadas por EE.UU. y aprobadas a la fuerza, razon por la cual no reflejan la "voluntad unanime" de los paises miembros de la ONU. 
					
					Es natural que la RPDC califique de crimen y rechace la fabricacion de tales "resoluciones de sancion" ilicitas. 
					
					La "sancion" anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y sus satelites centuplica la conviccion revolucionaria y la capacidad de autofortalecimiento del ejercito y pueblo coreanos y redobla su ferrea voluntad de enfrentarse a la ofensiva reaccionaria de los enemigos con la ofensiva revolucionaria. 
					
					EE.UU. debe actuar con prudencia conociendo claramente a su rival.
